thread.title: New Fed head reignites rate worries

title: New Fed head reignites rate worries
text:
New Fed head reignites rate worries 12:03pm EST - 01:51 
New Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell told lawmakers he personally believed the economy has strengthened since December but that won't stop the Fed from sticking to its plan for gradual interest rate hikes. Investors didn't believe him. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell told lawmakers he personally believed the economy has strengthened since December but that won't stop the Fed from sticking to its plan for gradual interest rate hikes.
